Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Good morning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Routine testing of the Mind Beacon commencing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Whirr—a blue light sweeps across the head of the white-haired girl.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Mind Beacon grid projection complete. Dependencies... Uh, let's leave that value alone for now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The white-haired girl lies motionlessly in the sleeping pod, not even twitching her eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineer', 3: 'M.I.N.D. stability... passed. M.I.N.D. container pressure... within acceptable limits. Routine Checklist... complete.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sleeping pod begins the air exchange necessary to open the hatch. The inert gas that serves as a barrier is sucked out through the vents of the air conditioning system.'}
{3: 'Woosh—'}

{3: 'The fresh air from outside instantaneously replaces the industrial-smelling inert gas. While the white-haired girl likes the sweet-smelling fresh air, she is more accustomed to the smell of the inert gas.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Air exchange complete. Vital signs... normal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Whew... That's good.", 4: '1'}

{3: "The white-haired girl's vision is a blur. She sees a young girl timidly approach Asimov, who is working on the equipment, from behind. She does not seem to dare make a sound. A nearby engineer notices and informs Asimov, who turns around."}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "...Mr. Asimov, the deep probe of Mr. Chrome's M.I.N.D. has been completed in accordance with the course teachings."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Alright, I'll head over. I'll leave things here to you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Asimov is not at all worried that the nine-year-old girl who stands before him will mess things up. She nods, climbs onto Asimov's high seat, and quietly watches his screen."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Alright, is Mr. Chrome still suffering from the effects of M.I.N.D. deviation?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'No, the deviation has been recalibrated by the Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Based on the readings, there has been no potential for damage or changes found for now. However, we have to be on guard.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Right now, there's only one thing we can be sure of—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov glances over at Rosa sitting in front of the screen. She is typing something on her terminal while looking at the records on screen.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The Glory frame's Inver-Device did encounter an abnormal Punishing Virus overload for unknown reasons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I built a lot of protection into it to prevent such situations, but it still led to this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Either the frame had previously undetected defects or there was something odd with the "Mother" he was fighting against.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "In short, a deep comprehensive probe of Chrome's M.I.N.D. is needed. Whatever the case may be, any such future incidences must be avoided.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Understood. Is the Gray Raven Commandant still able to help out with calibrations?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Unlikely. Medical care may have improved tremendously, but it will still take time for the commandant to fully heal.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Although the medical department has reluctantly agreed to allow the Gray Raven Commandant to move freely under medical supervision, if 【kuroname】 repeats such risky calibration...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Engineer', 3: "...I can imagine how they'll react. They'll probably come after us with their bone saws.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Engineer', 3: '...Alright.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "On our end, there are still some things that need to be confirmed, but with Vera taking care of them, I don't foresee too many issues.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Confirm the data and the conclusion. Once that's done, this matter's concluded.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Data confirmation... Memory Beacon grid projection uploaded to server... comparing... average deviation of 0.0014.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Within acceptable limits... data reconfirmation complete... checklist complete...'}
{3: "The white-haired girl in the sleeping pod completes yet another Babylonia Construct routine inspection. The sleeping pod's glass door slowly opens."}
{2: 'Engineer', 3: 'Good morning, No. 21.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '...Good morning.'}
{3: 'No. 21 knows she must be polite to the engineer carrying out maintenance on her.'}
{3: 'No. 21 springs out of the sleeping pod.'}
{3: 'A white creature dashes out from a dark corner of the sleeping pod and runs circles around No. 21.'}
{3: 'After a couple of circles, the white supporting Co-bot stops, as if remembering something.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What is it?'}
{3: "The supporting Co-bot's head spins before playing a voice message—"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Is the inspection complete? If it's done, hurry over to the entrance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 knows that she has to listen to Vera.'}
{3: "Without sparing another glance at the busy Science Council engineers, No. 21 steps out of the Science Council's maintenance department."}
{3: 'No. 21 has a mission. Vera is waiting to take her to the location.'}
